data.name: Darius for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Darius is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. He has a very handsome body. Do you think he has more chances to make a good career as a gigolo? Do you want to try how good he would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages. By default the male organ is Off, but in the settings room you can turn it on and switch between the different available organs. When you will play with Darius you will also get him as Steam Achievement.

Born in Jacksonville, Florida. As a young man, Darius was very impressed by Truman Capote, who posed in a suggestive photograph in the dust jacket of one of the books. Darius decided to become as cool and handsome as his idol.

Darius grew up to be a male escort, and he traveled to New York City to work for wealthy clients. He is extremely handsome, and speak with a Southern accent that everyone found to be very charming. He quickly got used to a life where he was constantly pampered. At that time he was known for laying in bed all day after making lots of money from his sex work, ordering room service, and asking other people to do difficult things for him. They called him a “kept boy”.

But very soon Darius got bored, and he decided to try himself in the other city. He moved to Los Angeles and want work as a gigolo here.

So, help Darius to take his place on the street!

data.short_description: Darius is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
